text: Nelson "Nico" Nicolaiewsky (9 June 1957 - 7 February 2014) was a Brazilian actor, musician, composer and comedian. He was best known for performing with Hique Gomez for over thirty years. He was born in Porto Alegre, Rio Grande do Sul. Nicolaiewsky died from leukemia on 7 February 2014 in Porto Alegre, aged 56. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1957 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Brazilian comedians Category:Brazilian movie actors Category:Brazilian musicians Category:Brazilian television actors Category:Cancer deaths in Brazil Category:Brazilian composers Category:Deaths from leukemia Category:People from Porto Alegre
title: Nico Nicolaiewsky
